      • setTrainingFolds

        public CNNClassifierBuilder setTrainingFolds(int trainingFolds)
        Sets the number of training folds to effective define the validation data set as 1/trainingFolds of the training data.
        Parameters:
        trainingFolds - number of folds, 1 of which is used as the validation data set during training. Set to 0 to use all the training data as the validation data.
        Returns:

      • setMinScoreChangePerEpoch

        public CNNClassifierBuilder setMinScoreChangePerEpoch(double minScoreChangePerEpoch)
        Parameters:
        minScoreChangePerEpoch - the minScoreChangePerEpoch to set. Set to 0 to disable early stopping of training.

      • setEpochScoreHistorySize
